title: Support ticket response time
body:
Hey,
I rarely post on the board so sorry in advance if I've got the wrong knowledge base area. How long does it usually take for a riot support ticket to be acknowledged/replied to?
I've submitted a ticket one or twice in the past and remember it being a same day kind of thing but I haven't heard back from my most recent one for a few days now, not even a "hey there, we're looking into it further" kind of reply, is this usual?

Once again, apologies if this is the wrong area or I'm asking a wrong question but thanks in advance :)

replies.body: Usually within one day. If they're extremely busy, wait up to one week. If they still haven't replied, then it means that they're trying to get a human to respond.
